Title: Relates to police officer and peace officer hiring and transfers
Summary: Relates to police officer and peace officer hiring and transfers and requires police agencies review any possible internal files of police misconduct and complaints as well as pending criminal charges before hiring or allowing for a transfer.
LawCode: Add ยง845-e, Exec L; amd ยง50-a, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the civil rights law, in relation to police officer and peace officer hiring and transfers
